text: Halo Khan Ardalan (Kurdish: Helo Xan/ھەڵۆ خان) was one of the Ardalan rulers in the sixteenth and seventeenth century. He ruled the autonomous Ardalan state from 1590 to 1616.[1] He is known as the most powerful Ardalan ruler. He ruled over a large part of Kurdistan and his state was majorly independent from Safavid and Ottoman empire Category:1616 deaths Category:Kurdistan
title: Halo Khan Ardalan
